name.ch: 大地工程可靠度計算與風險分析

goal.ch: "The course aims to impart moderate to advanced knowledge regarding probability and statistics, and the application to reliability and risk assessment, especially in geotechnical engineering.  After the course, the students are able to evaluate the reliability of geotechnical facilities, and make proper decisions during reliability-based designs."
goal.en: "The course aims to impart moderate to advanced knowledge regarding probability and statistics, and the application to reliability and risk assessment, especially in geotechnical engineering.  After the course, the students are able to evaluate the reliability of geotechnical facilities, and make proper decisions during reliability-based designs."

outline.ch:
"Review of probability and statistics
Bayesian approach
Function of random variable
Monte Carlo Simulation
Point estimate method
First-order second-moment approach
Advanced first-order second-moment approach
Markov chain
Load and resistance factor design"

Risk assessment in geotechnical engineering, by G. Fenton and D.V. Griffiths"
